CustomField.formula:
If ( Lab_zone__c = "US",HYPERLINK("https://www.backmarket.com/boutique/" &
SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(LOWER( Merchant_Name__r.Name),",","")," ","-"),".","") &
"-" & TEXT(Merchant_P_K__c) , "Click here") ,HYPERLINK("https://www.backmarket.fr/boutique/" & SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(LOWER( Merchant_Name__r.Name),",","")," ","-"),".","") & "-" & TEXT(Merchant_P_K__c) , "Click here"))
CustomField.label: Link to merchant's boutique
